title: Newtons first law - astronaut in equilibrium

content.question: An astronaut jumps from the surface of the Moon and follows the path shown by the dashed line. At Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math>, the astronaut is at the highest point in the path. Air resistance is negligible.
